name: Tributary condition and impact rapid curve

points.description: Observation: Stability and turbidity at confluences during storms Criteria: Mostly natural tributaries with stable flows and typical sediment loads
Observation: One or two moderately altered tributaries with occasional elevated turbidity Criteria: One or two moderately altered tributaries with occasional elevated turbidity
Observation: Multiple significantly altered tributaries with frequent sediment plumes Criteria: Multiple significantly altered tributaries with frequent sediment plumes
Observation: Widespread severely altered tributaries or severe pollution at many confluences Criteria: Widespread severely altered tributaries or severe pollution at many confluences
